General.Name: PPK Group Ltd
General.Description: PPK Group Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides nanomaterials, artificial intelligence, and energy solutions primarily in Australia. It engages in the design and manufacture batteries and full battery energy storage systems for the stationary storage market; and manufacture of white graphen. The company was formerly known as Plaspak Group Limited and changed its name to PPK Group Limited in September 2006. PPK Group Limited was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Brisbane, Australia.

0.Name: Mr. Kenneth  Hostland B.Com., C.A., CPA, M.B.A.
0.Title: Group CFO
